TtsSpan.VerbatimBuilder(java.lang.String.Description: Creates a builder for a TtsSpan of type @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#TYPE_VERBATIM_E@ and sets the @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#ARG_VERBATIM_E@ argument.

TtsSpan.VerbatimBuilder().Description: Creates a builder for a TtsSpan of type @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#TYPE_VERBATIM_E@.

Parameters: String: A string of characters that will be read verbatim, except whitespace.

ClassDesc: A builder for TtsSpans of type @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#TYPE_VERBATIM_E@.
